verses.verse: The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> were <S%H3615>finished,<s%> and all their vast <S%H6635>array.<s%>

On the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> his <S%H4399>work<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made;<s%> and he <S%H7673>rested<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> from all his <S%H4399>work<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and made it <S%H6942>holy,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H7673>rested<s%> in it from all his <S%H4399>work<s%> which <S%H430>he<s%> had <S%H1254>created<s%> and <S%H6213>made.<s%>

This is the history of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and of the <S%H776>earth<s%> when they were <S%H1254>created,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>

No <S%H7880>plant<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> was <S%H2962>yet<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and no <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> had <S%H2962>yet<s%> sprung <S%H6779>up;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3808>not<s%> caused it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%> There was <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H5647>till<s%> the <S%H127>ground,<s%>
but a <S%H108>mist<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H8248>watered<s%> the whole <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H127>ground,<s%> and <S%H5301>breathed<s%> into his <S%H639>nostrils<s%> the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H2416>life;<s%> and <S%H120>man<s%> became a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H6924>eastward,<s%> in <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H3335>formed.<s%>

<S%H4480>Out<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6779>made<s%> every <S%H6086>tree<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> that is <S%H2530>pleasant<s%> to the <S%H4758>sight,<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H3978>food;<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> also in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

A <S%H5104>river<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H1588>garden;<s%> and from there it was <S%H6504>parted,<s%> and became <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> is <S%H6376>Pishon:<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is the one which <S%H5437>flows<s%> through the whole <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> there is <S%H2091>gold;<s%>
and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%> There is aromatic <S%H916>resin<s%> and the <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stone.<s%>
The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H1521>Gihon:<s%> the same river that flows <S%H5437>through<s%> the whole <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush.<s%>

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H2313>Hiddekel:<s%> this is the one which flows <S%H1980>in<s%> <S%H6926>front<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%> The <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is the <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H120>man,<s%> and put <S%H3240>him<s%> into the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to <S%H5647>dress<s%> it and to keep <S%H8104>it.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Of every <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> you may <S%H398>freely<s%> <S%H398>eat;<s%>

but of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil,<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3117>it;<s%> for in the day that you <S%H398>eat<s%> of it you will <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is not <S%H2896>good<s%> that the <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6213>alone;<s%> I will make him a helper suitable for <S%H5828>him.<s%>"

Out of the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> every <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and every <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to the <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> what he would <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H120>them.<s%> Whatever the man <S%H7121>called<s%> every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> was its <S%H8034>name.<s%>

The <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7121>gave<s%> <S%H8034>names<s%> to all <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and to every <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> but for <S%H120>man<s%> there was not <S%H4672>found<s%> a helper suitable for <S%H5828>him.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5307>caused<s%> a deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> on the <S%H121>man,<s%> and he <S%H3462>slept;<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H6763>ribs,<s%> and closed <S%H5462>up<s%> the flesh in its <S%H1320>place.<s%>

He <S%H1129>made<s%> the <S%H6763>rib,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H120>man,<s%> into a <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> her to the <S%H120>man.<s%>

The <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>"This<s%> is <S%H6471>now<s%> <S%H6106>bone<s%> of my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%> <S%H2063>She<s%> will be <S%H7121%H99999>called<s%> 'woman,' because <S%H2063>she<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> out of <S%H376>Man.<s%>"

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H5800>leave<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and will <S%H1692>join<s%> with his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and they will be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
They were <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H6174>naked,<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and were not <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
